筆.definition: pen; pencil; writing brush; to write or compose; the strokes of Chinese characters; classifier for sums of money, deals; CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

筆下.definition: the wording and purport of what one writes

筆仙.definition: a form of automatic writing in which two or more participants hold a single pen over a sheet of paper and invite a spirit to write answers to their questions; a spirit so invited

筆供.definition: written evidence, as opposed to oral evidence 口供[kou3 gong4]

筆刷.definition: paintbrush; writing brush (esp. in graphics software)

筆劃.definition: variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]

筆劃檢字表.definition: lookup table for Chinese character based on radical and stroke count

筆力.definition: vigor of strokes in calligraphy or drawing; vigor of style in literary composition

筆套.definition: the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush; the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)

筆尖.definition: nib; pen point; the tip of a writing brush or pencil

筆帽.definition: the cap of a pen, pencil, or writing brush

筆心.definition: pencil lead; refill (for a ball-point pen)

筆挺.definition: (standing) very straight; straight as a ramrod; bolt upright; well-ironed; trim

筆桿.definition: the shaft of a pen or writing brush; (metonym) pen (as in 耍筆桿|耍笔杆[shua3 bi3gan3] and 搖筆桿|摇笔杆[yao2 bi3gan3])

筆法.definition: technique of writing, calligraphy or drawing

筆畫數.definition: stroke count (number of brushstrokes of a Chinese character)

筆直.definition: perfectly straight; straight as a ramrod; bolt upright

筆算.definition: to do a sum in writing; written calculation

筆者.definition: the author; the writer (usu. refers to oneself)

筆耕.definition: to make a living by writing; to write (as an author)

筆觸.definition: brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy; brushwork; style of drawing or writing

筆記.definition: to take down (in writing); notes; a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches; CL:本[ben3]

筆記本.definition: notebook (stationery) (CL:本[ben3]); (computing) laptop; notebook (abbr. for 筆記本電腦|笔记本电脑[bi3ji4ben3 dian4nao3])

筆記本計算機.pinyin: bǐ jì běn jì suàn jī

筆試.definition: written examination; paper test (for an applicant)

筆誤.definition: a slip of a pen; CL:處|处[chu4]

筆談.definition: to communicate by means of written notes (instead of speaking); to publish one's opinion (e.g. as part of a scholarly dialogue); (in book titles) essays; sketches

筆走龍蛇.definition: lit. the brush flows with the fluidity of a dragon or snake (idiom); fig. (of brushwork, esp for calligraphy) lively; vigorous

筆鋒.definition: the tip of a writing brush; vigor of style in writing; stroke; touch

筆錄.definition: to put down in writing; to take down notes; transcript; record

筆頭.definition: ability to write; writing skill; written; in written form
